content:
**gauge ** each motif measures 5-1/2 inches 14 cm from point to point across center before blocking for a tablecloth 65 x 90 inches 165 x 229 cm make 188 motifs
**materials ** * clark s o n t or j & p coats big ball best six cord mercerized crochet size 30 24 balls of white or ecru or 32 balls of any color * milward s steel crochet hook no 9 or 10
